column5: Stay prepared for every ride with PEARL iZUMi's premium cycling jackets and vests. Engineered for all-weather performance, these layers offer unmatched comfort, style, and innovation, ensuring you're ready to answer the call of the ride, rain or shine.
column15: two cyclists wearing PEARL iZUMi Cycling Jackets

column5: Elevate your ride with PEARL iZUMi mountain bike jerseys. Engineered with breathable fabrics and innovative designs, our jerseys keep you cool and focused, whether racing or exploring. Gear up to conquer every mile in style.
column22: Shop Mountain Bike Jerseys for Any Adventure | PEARL iZUMi
column23: Ride in style and comfort with PEARL iZUMi mountain bike jerseys. Breathable, moisture-wicking, and durable—built for the toughest trails.

column5: Gear up with PEARL iZUMi's cycling baselayers, engineered for comfort and performance. These layers regulate body temperature, wick moisture, and ensure an enjoyable ride in any weather. Whether you're chasing miles or commuting, experience unmatched comfort and versatility.
column22: Cycling Baselayers for Every Ride | PEARL iZUMi
column23: Discover PEARL iZUMi's premium cycling baselayers, designed for optimal warmth, moisture-wicking, and comfort in all weather conditions. Perfect for every ride.

column5: Weather be damned with the AmFIB® Collection. Built to brave wind, rain, and cold, this gear empowers you to ride further, no matter the forecast.

column22: Weather-Ready AmFIB® Cycling Collection | PEARL iZUMi
column23: Conquer the elements with the AmFIB® Collection. Windproof and water-resistant cycling gear designed for cold and wet conditions.

column4: Cycling Gear with Advanced Cooling Technology
column5: Dominate the summer heat with PEARL iZUMi’s cooling technology. Our gear features In-R-Cool® technology, enhancing thermoregulation during high-output rides. Stay focused, stay cool, and push your limits with lightweight, breathable cycling apparel designed for peak performance.
column15: Cycling Gear with Advanced Cooling Technology
column22: Beat the Heat with Advanced Cooling Cycling Gear | PEARL iZUMi
column23: Stay cool on every ride with PEARL iZUMi’s advanced cooling technology. Lightweight, breathable designs keep you comfortable in high heat.

column22: Women's Gravel Cycling Gloves | PEARL iZUMi
column23: Women's gravel cycling gloves designed for comfort and protection on rough terrain. Shop full finger and short finger styles at PEARL iZUMi.

column5: Protect yourself on every trail with PEARL iZUMi’s mountain bike protection gear. Built for durability and comfort, our collection ensures you stay safe while pushing your limits.
column22: Reliable Mountain Bike Protection Gear | PEARL iZUMi
column23: Ride boldly with PEARL iZUMi mountain bike protection. Knee guards, gloves, and durable gear designed to keep you safe and confident.

column5: Face the elements head-on with PEARL iZUMi’s cycling jackets and vests. Crafted for all-weather riding, our designs offer unmatched protection and breathability, empowering you to break away from limits and ride further.

column23: Conquer any ride with PEARL iZUMi’s cycling jackets and vests. Lightweight, weatherproof gear for every cycling condition.

column5: Don’t let the weather dictate your ride. Our women’s cycling jackets and vests are designed to keep you dry, warm, and confident. Featuring windproof and waterproof technologies, these layers ensure peak performance in unpredictable conditions.

Road/gravel jerseys prioritize aero efficiency and low bulk; MTB jerseys favor durability, mobility, and compatibility with packs/pads. Choose based on your terrain and gear."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"How do I choose between short‑sleeve and long‑sleeve men’s cycling jerseys?","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":"

column5: When every mile matters, cargo bib shorts are the way to go. These shorts solve a problem that every serious rider faces: how to carry the essentials without sacrificing performance. With us, no jersey is no problem. PEARL iZUMi designs cycling bib shorts with pockets that work perfectly for long distances, rugged terrain, and relentless effort. Trusted by endurance riders and gravel grinders alike, scroll below to find the right bikepacking bib shorts for you.

column5: Most bib shorts are built for bodies they weren’t designed to fit. PEARL iZUMi women’s cargo bib shorts change that. Focusing on fit, storage, and support, these shorts solve the comfort and function issues female cyclists deal with on long rides. From gravel to bikepacking, every detail moves with you, no matter how many miles you’re going.

And if you’re still building mileage, our SELECT shorts offer the reliable comfort you need. "}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Thoughtful strap placement and soft, supportive waistbands on our female cargo bib shorts ensure a secure, comfortable feel without worrying about digging or slipping. "}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Need to compare options or shop for someone else? Thigh and rear pockets are positioned for easy access, and the layout works with women’s riding posture. "}]},{"type":"heading","level":3,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"What makes PEARL iZUMi’s women’s cycling bib shorts truly women-specific? ","bold":true}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"These aren’t just smaller versions of men’s gear: our designers engineer women’s cycling bib shorts from the ground up, using women-specific chamois shapes, strap angles, and waistband construction. We construct every design to match how women ride and recover on the bike. "}]},{"type":"heading","level":3,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"Can I use women’s gravel bike shorts for other types of riding?","bold":true}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Absolutely! column5:
Cold Miles. No Compromise.
Thermal layers, windproof shells, and water-shedding protection engineered to hold warmth, dump excess heat, and keep you moving when temps drop. Layer up and keep the pace from first frost to last light.

Empower your ride with the Women’s Expedition Collection from PEARL iZUMi. Designed by women, for women, this collection combines style, performance, and comfort to meet the demands of gravel and adventure cycling. With innovative fabrics and rider-focused features, you’ll conquer new challenges while staying comfortable and prepared.
column22: Unleash Adventure with the Women’s Expedition Collection | PEARL iZUMi
column23: Shop PEARL iZUMi’s Women’s Expedition Collection. Cycling gear designed for women who demand comfort, durability, and performance on any terrain.

column5: Discover gravel cycling shorts and bibs crafted to keep you pedaling with ease. With water-resistant technology and advanced chamois designs, PEARL iZUMi’s shorts let you tackle gravel trails and rugged terrain without compromise. Push boundaries and experience comfort mile after mile.

column5: Long days in the saddle—or, in this case, bike seat—demand more than just basic gear. PEARL iZUMi men’s cargo bib shorts solve the problems of limited storage, poor fit, and discomfort over rough terrain or multi-hour rides. Designed for serious cyclists who need lasting support and smart function, our men’s bikepacking shorts perform day after day where others fall short.
